issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Fo4 4.0, we will be promoting a 64-bit version of Appcelerator Studio of OS X.

At the very least, we should use the 64-bit download on the page here:

http://web.appcelerator.com/firsttime/studio.html

If possible, we could try shipping the beta mac installer.
fields.summary: Promote 64-bit OS X installer for Appcelerator Studio

comments.body: I believe this is correct now: https://web.appcelerator.com/product/studio
